headline: Big Funds Sit Out Trump Tariff Volley; But A Few Hopefuls Turn To Netflix As Earnings Loom
summary: Funds are buying Netflix and Philip Morris amid the Trump tariff stock market meltdown. Both stocks are near all-time highs.

headline: IQOS Collaborates with Italian Design Brand SELETTI: Introducing the 'Curious X: Sensorium Piazza' at Milan Design Week
summary: STAMFORD, CT, April 07, 2025--In support of Philip Morris International’s (NYSE: PM) mission to make cigarettes obsolete, and to celebrate its ever-growing community of more than 32 million users worldwide – IQOS is proud to announce its collaboration with iconic design brand SELETTI at Milan Design Week.
